title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.7 - Request for payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.7 - Request for payment

State Regulations
A contractor shall request payment by submitting to the
designated payment office: (a) a proper
invoice; or
(b) in the case of a
contract for services, a trust voucher accompanied by such documentation as may
be specified in the contract document. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9500.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
